text: Countryman is a 1982 Jamaican action adventure drama movie directed by Dickie Johnson. It stars Edwin Lothan, Hiram Keller, Carl Bradshaw, Basil Keane, Freshey Richardson, Kristina St. Clair, Papa Threecards and Ronnie McKay. ==Other websites== * Category:1982 action movies Category:1982 adventure movies Category:1982 drama movies Category:Jamaican movies Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies set in Jamaica
title: Countryman (movie)
